archimate:BusinessService.name: E-Branch Operations
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Example of use: A day in the life of a web based banking service, dynamically assigns traffic across processing capabilities to minimize response delays
General comment: This is the operating schedule for the E-branch production systems, including access checks, load balancing and device failure and recovery handling - typically a complex 24/7 operation. It can include computer telephony integration (CTI) with branch and call center channels. Note the on-line facilities should match teller and ATM customer viewpoints making allowances for the self serve nature of the dialogue and channel limitations as necessary
